Tue, 02 Jul 2024 17:02:00 +0000 Kāinga Ora still intends to deliver 300 homes by the middle of 2026 in Rotorua. Those projects could include (clockwise from left) two on Fairy Springs Rd, one on Clayton Rd and a large development on Mansfield Place. Photos / Andrew Warner
